channel.title: No hitpoints BAR HELP!
channel.description: Okay, so i followed a tutorial and change my hitpoints bar on my server, compiled it was fine, then i started my server logged in and as soon as i logged in my cleint gave me these errors, and there were no hitpoints bars at all! [code]java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException at Sprite.getSubImage(Sprite.java:588) at client.updateEntities(client.java:1855) at client.method146(client.java:12764) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8631) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9416) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5020) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: No hitpoints BAR HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Morgan_Linder Morgan Linder
item.description:
@Morgan_Linder wrote:

Okay, so i followed a tutorial and change my hitpoints bar on my server, compiled it was fine, then i started my server logged in and as soon as i logged in my cleint gave me these errors, and there were no hitpoints bars at all!

java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException at Sprite.getSubImage(Sprite.java:588) at client.updateEntities(client.java:1855) at client.method146(client.java:12764) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8631) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9416) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5020) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic
